creditline: Gift of Mrs. T. Leslie Shear Sr.
inscribed: Inscribed on back in Messenian alphabet with a dedication by Pythodoros to the River Pamisos. [See accession card for reproduction of inscription].

texts.textentryhtml: Given to the Museum by Mrs. T. Leslie Shear Sr. in 1947
